review: Joe is awesome, quick, and super smart! He knows his stuff... [He] always gets to the bottom of it!

Joe helped me out with a complex task. Rather than taking control of my machine and doing the work he helped me figure out myself and deeply understand what I should do. I will probably work with him in the future if I need to, his prices are really reasonable for his expertise. I can only recommend. Thanks Joe

He solved my problem with WPF .NET code efficiently (after I struggled with it for hours by myself) and in the process also gave me a better idea how the code works so I am less likely to run into other problems. I will make a point to request his help again the next time I get stuck.

Joe is amazing - he looks thoroughly to the issue and gets to the bottom of the issue... He helped me understand all the technical concepts - will def work with him again and recommend him for anyone looking for technical help... Joe is an expert in what he does, def recommend him!
Joe was super fast and direct to the point to efficiently check what I needed, I am very grateful to Joe!
Super fast and skilled. One of the best I've worked with on codementor.
Very knowledgeable about anything Azure DevOps related. Helped me understand and implement a working pipeline for deployment.
Fixed 2 different issues of code that I was hard stuck struggling with. Great service!
